reviewText: Ordered this series based on customer reviews and was sadly disappointed.  It was NOT what I hoped for but if you enjoy aerobic Pilates perhaps this is for you.  Annoying redundant instructor who is extremely proud of her Winsor Pilates Sculpting Band.  NOT impressed and would avoid Winsor Pilates at all costs.
Great for faster toning.  It really is a lot of the normal Mari routine but with the band it increases the intensity and toning.
